comments.body: Strange, http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/xenial/ shows only i386 and amd64, although the `Release` and `InRelease` files show the other architectures.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +54,58 @@# Use dynamic cgo linking for architectures other than amd64 for the server platforms
# To install crossbuild essential for other architectures add the following repository.
RUN echo "deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu xenial main universe" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/cgocrosscompiling.list \
  && apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 40976EAF437D05B5 3B4FE6ACC0B21F32 \
  && apt-get update \

comments.body: we probably need to split this PR into two parts, since we need a new cross-build (and other) images before the cross-build will work in Jenkins.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@  linux/arm linux/arm64 \
  linux/ppc64le \
  linux/s390x \
  darwin/amd64 darwin/386 \
  windows/amd64 windows/386
